content:
# I successfully harvested 10 coal, and my inventory now contains 22 wood, 10 coal, and 5 stones. 
# With coal in hand, I can now fuel the stone furnace.

# I will place coal into the stone furnace to provide it with the necessary fuel for smelting.

# First, I will add coal to the furnace's inventory.
add_to_inventory(furnace_entity, 'coal', quantity=5)  # Adding 5 coal to the furnace

# Now, I will check the furnace's inventory to confirm that the coal has been added.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace_entity)
print(f"Furnace Inventory after adding coal: {furnace_inventory}")  # Checking the furnace's inventory again

# Next, I will need to gather some iron ore to smelt into iron plates. 
# I will search for the nearest iron ore resource patch.
iron_resource_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Finding the nearest iron ore resource
move_to(iron_resource_position)  # Moving to the iron ore resource position
harvest_resource(iron_resource_position, quantity=10)  # Harvesting 10 iron ore

# After harvesting, I will check the inventory to see the results.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Inspecting the inventory after harvesting iron ore
